altTitles.ja: がんばれ同期ちゃん

description.en: "Cute" love story of girls who will stop at nothing but making the eyeless protagonist theirs!

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

description.en: Cha Gunmu' , who infiltrates the after-party of L Company's shareholders' meeting to find clues about Red Diamond, encounters 'Yeon Taeoh', the youngest son of the Yeonsun Group and a genius racer. While chasing the target, Gunmu witnesses Taeoh drinking alcohol laced with drugs, and ends up saving him and missing the target. In the hotel where the drugged Teoh was laid to rest, something strange happened to the drugged Taeoh...? “Why don’t you bear all your responsibilities to the end?” Gunmu, who was helplessly caught up in Taeoh’s actions, leaves the hotel room disgusted by his arrogant attitude and vows never to see him again, but he hears that his target, Red Diamond, is related to the Yeonseon Group... “This debt will be properly repaid later.” Would this be just a moment of burning pleasure or a tenacious and brutal relationship?
description.fr: Cha Geonmu, qui s'est infiltré à l'after party de la réunion des actionnaires de la société L pour trouver des indices sur Red Diamond, rencontre Yeon Tae-oh le plus jeune fils du groupe Yeonsu, un coureur de jupons. En poursuivant sa cible, Geonmu voit Tae-oh boire un verre rempli d'alcool et de drogues. Il finit par secourir Tae-oh et rate sa cible. Il dépose Tae-oh à un hôtel, mais est-ce qu'il y a un problème avec le Tae-oh drogué...? tu "Pourquoi ne prends responsabilités jusqu'au bout ?" pas tes Ennuyé et dégoûté par l'attitude de Tae-oh, Geonmu quitte la chambre d'hôtel en se promettant de ne plus rencontrer son chemin. Cependant, il découvre que Red Diamond est lié au groupe Yeonsu...

altTitles.ja: テロメア

description.en:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en:
Jang Young-guk’, who achieved great success as a supporting actor.
Received the first and honorable Best Supporting Actor Award at the Acting Awards.

However, on that day, his mother passed away…

Horrified by the death of his mother, whom he neglected for years, Young-guk decided to end his life…

Before his death, he longingly recalled the warmth of his mother and the peaceful memories of the past. He regretted turning his back on those memories…

At that moment, he suddenly regressed to his childhood…

“I regressed, to that past I missed”

“As an inescapable fact, this life is just…”

Once again, the story of a person who wants to live as an actor begins.
Will he be able to live a happy life unlike the previous life?

title.en: A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女はとこにいざなう
クセ強彼女は床(とこ)にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusetsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

description.en:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
description.ja:
昔好きだったお姉さんといきなり同棲!?しかもヤリマ●疑惑が浮上!?

一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月（ルナ）の家で同棲することに。
昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。
他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外の
エッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?

ビッチ？なお姉さんたちに囲まれる楽しい新生活、開幕ーー。

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Based off of the critically acclaimed manga series Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z by Akira Toriyama, Young Jijii sets the stage for an excellent story and awesome adventures in the Dragon Ball Universe! Dragon Ball AF takes place three years after the end of Dragon Ball GT, following the adventures of the Z-Fighters and their fight against the all-mighty Lord Ize, son of Frieza!   
Dragon Ball AF has no affiliation with Akira Toriyama, Funamation, Toei Animation, or Fuji TV. Dragon Ball AF is a fan-made doujinshi created by Young Jijii and is made purely for entertainment.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

title.en: The Status Window to the Soul

altTitles.en: Baby Princess Through the Status Window
Baby Princess Looking at the Status Window
The Baby Princess Can See Status Windows

altTitles.pt: A princesa bebê pode ver as janelas de status

altTitles.zh: 看见状态栏的宝贝皇女

altTitles.ja: 真実が見える赤ちゃん皇女様

altTitles.vi: Công Chúa Bé Con Nhìn Vào Cửa Sổ Trạng Thái

description.en:
Princess Chervianne Aerveldote has lived a lonely life, and now she's being put to death for a crime she didn't commit. However, her execution turns out to be a fresh start when she wakes up as her 5-year-old self with an ability to read people's thoughts with status windows. Chervianne quickly learns how badly she misjudged everyone in the past, finding affection and betrayal in unexpected places. But will her newfound insight be enough to change her story and finally find love in her life?

---
I was condemned as a cruel villain and sentenced to death. But somehow, I was transported back to the past when I was a five-year-old child. The moment I faced my father, who looked much younger now, a strange blue window appeared before my eyes — it was a pale blue window that revealed another’s inner self.

[Alderuan Erveldote]
Role: Emperor (Lv.99)
Favorability: 90,980,984
Mood: Dear daughter I miss you

…But Father...? I assume it’s Dad's feelings but… What the Hell is going on?

[Damian Erveldote]
Mood: Glad to see my sister
Thoughts: I want to talk to you T ^ T

[Ellie]
Mood: Holding back from breaking the wall because it’s too cute
Thoughts: I’ll definitely make a commemorative collection titled “The Daily Life of a Cute Princess!”

[Karmen Kasselov]
Mood: Excited
Thoughts: Why is it that every time I see you, you are one step more beautiful? What do they feed you at my palace? Do they have a magic potion that can make everyone this beautiful?

I used to think that everyone held a grudge against me, but seeing how they treat me like that I guess that’s not true?! If what the status window tells me is true then maybe I can live a better life in this lifetime!

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57183975)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%83%81%ED%83%9C%EC%B0%BD-%EB%B3%B4%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3053), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60402003)

description.en: The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?

description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

altTitles.ja: 枕魚

description.en:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
description.ru: Странные будни странной девочки в странном городе, полном странных созданий.

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 8 - JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版

description.en:
Eighth story arc of JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken series.  
  
Following the Great East Japan earthquake, Morioh has been stricken by vast earthen protrusions known by the locals as Wall Eyes. Despite investigation, professional estimations are left empty. Meanwhile, the young girl Yasuho Hirose discovers a man buried within the ground, he possesses a distinctive star-shaped birthmark together with deeply penetrating bite marks. The man, who has contracted a staple case of amnesia is taken in by a local family and given the name Jousuke Higashikata, however mysterious events cannot stop from piling one upon the other and soon that enigma known as stand emerges to complement the great cloud of confusion.  
  
- The monochrome version won the Grand Prize in the manga category at the 17th Japan Media Arts Festival in 2013.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

title.en: Isekai Ooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Oooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.en: A JK Falls in Love in the Depths of Another World

altTitles.ja: 異世界大奥でJKは恋をする

description.en:
16 year old Himeno Shion has never experienced love. Unfortunately, she suddenly hit by a truck and gets transported no another world!

[Do you want to all in love?]

Right when she's about be eaten by a dragon, she gets saved by handsome hero named Ars. After bring Shion to his castle, Dragonia, she discovers that he wants to gather a harem girls from other races!?

title.en: Bakunyuu-tachi ni Tsuihou Saretaga Modore to Iwaretemo, mou oso…Modorimashiyuu!

altTitles.ja: 爆乳たちに追放されたが戻れと言われても、もう遅……戻りましゅぅぅ!

description.en:
A heart-pounding temptation to corrupt a magical swordsman who can slaughter even dragons!

Shin, a magical swordsman, was expelled from an adventuring party just before reaching S-rank. He decides to live on his own, but a former party member appears before him and asks him to return, but he refuses.

The disappointed members are left behind. As a hard-line measure, the girls begin seducing him with their voluptuous bodies!

Strong on magic but weak on tits, they start a lewd war of attrition!
 
--- 

Web Novel Raw:  [https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4772hx/](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4772hx/)
description.es:
La tentación desgarradora de corromper a un espadachín mágico capaz de matar incluso a dragones.

Shin, un espadachín mágico, fue expulsado de un grupo de aventureros justo antes de alcanzar el rango S. Decide vivir por su propia cuenta. Pero un ex miembro del grupo se le aparece y le pide que vuelva, pero él se niega.

Los miembros decepcionados se quedan atrás. Como medida de mano dura, ¡las chicas empiezan a seducirle con sus voluptuosos cuerpos!

Poderoso en magia pero débil con las tetas, ¡empiezan una morbosa guerra de desgaste!
description.id: Shin, pendekar pedang sihir yang diusir dari party petualang yang akan mencapai peringkat S, Memutuskan untuk hidup sendiri, tapi mantan anggota party muncul di hadapannya dan memintanya untuk kembali, tapi dia menolak. Anggota yang kecewa karena tertinggal memulai dengan rayuan menggunakan tubuh menggairahkan mereka sebagai metode yang kuat!
description.ja:
優秀なのに追放されてしまった主人公の「シン」。
昔の仲間とは離れて、僕は一人でやっていくしか……

「シンがパーティーに戻ってきたら、毎日楽しみ放題だな」
「シンだけのおっぱいハーレムだよ♡」
「早く戻ってきて、私たち大切な仲間とい～～っぱい♡気持ちよくなりましょ……？」

「あっ…も…もどりましゅぅぅううぅうぅうう♡♡♡♡」
description.es-la:
La tentación desgarradora de corromper a un espadachín mágico capaz de matar incluso a dragones.

Shin, un espadachín mágico, fue expulsado de un grupo de aventureros justo antes de alcanzar el rango S. Decide vivir por su propia cuenta. Pero un ex miembro del grupo se le aparece y le pide que vuelva, pero él se niega.

Los miembros decepcionados se quedan atrás. Como medida de mano dura, ¡las chicas empiezan a seducirle con sus voluptuosos cuerpos!

Poderoso en magia pero débil con las tetas, ¡empiezan una morbosa guerra de desgaste!

title.en: Magical★Explorer - Eroge no Yuujin Kyara ni Tensei Shitakedo, Game Chishiki Tsukatte Jiyuu ni Ikiru

altTitles.ja: マジカル★エクスプローラー エロゲの友人キャラに転生したけど、ゲーム知識使って自由に生きる

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - Reborn as a Eroge Hero's Friend, I'll Live Freely with my Eroge Knowledge

altTitles.ru: Переродившись в друга главного героя эроге, я буду жить свободно, используя мои знания эроге

description.en: There’s a legendary Bishoujo Game that has become popular among Japanese gentlemen. Its name is “ Magical★Explorer” or Magiero for short. The game’s protagonist has a cheat-like power with 12 different beautiful heroines to flirt with, including additional 12 heroines from the DLC, a harem of 24 beauties. I have become that protagonist!………………Not. Instead, I have become the third-wheel character who always laughing like an idiot next to him. There’s no heroine that would lay their eyes on me.    But now I couldn’t care less about the protagonist and his heroines. Why? Because I discovered magic. While I was using it, I have become interested in it. I want to master it. I want to become the strongest. Thus I have decided. I would abandon half my role as a protagonist’s friend to train my magic and then I would beat the hell out of that cheat who can solo the Demon King.    ………..I was training with that thought in mind, but somehow I keep getting closer to the heroines and furthermore, I don’t know why I keep encounter events like I am some Eroge’s protagonist.
description.ja: 伝説の美少女ゲーム『マジカル★エクスプローラー』。俺はこのゲームでチートなスキルを持つモテモテの主人公！……の横でへらへらと笑う不遇な友人キャラに転生していた…！？

description.en: A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

description.en: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Digital colored version of Akira Toriyama's original best selling manga

altTitles.ja: 花燭の白

altTitles.en: The White of a Flower Lamp

description.en: A mysterious disease in which one day people suddenly rise back from the Underworld: The Withering Death. When Kiso, a newspaper journalist, starts investigating the strange disease, he is attacked by a grotesque-looking demon. The one who saves him is a girl he had met by chance… The girl, whom Kiso is peculiarly drawn to, for some reason calls herself a "Demon's Burning Light"…?
description.ja: 死んだ人が、ある日突然黄泉帰る、謎の病気『枯死病』。新聞記者の木曽は、この奇妙な病の取材をしていた最中、異形の鬼に襲われてしまう。彼を救ったのは、偶然出会った少女だった…。なぜか、強くその少女に惹かれる木曽だが、少女は自らを『鬼の花燭』だと告げてきて――？
description.pt-br: Surgiu uma doença misteriosa que fez com que, um dia as pessoas voltassem repentinamente do Mundo Inferior. A Morte Fulminante. Quando Kiso, um jornalista de jornal, começa a investigar a estranha doença, ele é atacado por um demônio de aparência grotesca. Quem o salva é uma garota que ele conheceu por acaso… A garota, por quem Kiso é peculiarmente atraído, por algum motivo se autodenomina uma “Luz Ardente do Demônio”…?

altTitles.ja: 岬くんの不器用な溺愛

description.en: A love story that depicts the cohabitation life of Kyouka (27), a beautiful and tight-fitting office lady, and her boyfriend, Misaki (20), who is a handsome college student. At the company, Kyouka does her job with a machine-like expression, but in front of the cape, she always has a spoiled personality. Misaki always has an unfriendly attitude toward her. Kyouka becomes suspicious of his affair because he has never been told that he likes it even after dating.

altTitles.ja: 謎の彼女Ｘ

description.en:
One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…

altTitles.ja: 俺、限定コミュ症なんでっ。

description.en: Winner of LINE Manga Award: I don't have the normal kind of communication problem! If it's kids, I can get along with them just fine - my communication problems are limited! Nashikawa, a high school student with this kind of troublesome disposition, enters a "Volunteering Club", in which he watches kids!? Will Nashikawa be able to overcome his communication problems while being surrounded by quirky club members and little kids!?

During a rainy evening, is the start of the story between Myrtis and Dennis. Starting from a lie, and by creating more and more lies, Myrtis finally be able to be with Dennis's side. But how long will this situation going on?

altTitles.ja: 君ノ声

description.en:
A man with the ability to hear inner voices got married to a girl who can't speak.  
  
It's the Taisho era. Kyogoku Kazunari, who can hear people's inner voices, makes skillful use of his ability by running a trading company.  
His business is going well, but due to his power, he cannot trust others and has been quite bitter so far.   
Wanting to make use of their connections, Kazunari has propposed to marry the daughter of the noble Suwabe family. However, not only can he not hear the inner voice of his partner Suwabe Nana, she is also unable to speak.  
While Kazunari is bewildered, the two of them get married on the spur of the moment…? A clumsy but happy married life begins for them.
description.id:
Seorang pria dengan kemampuan untuk mendengar suara hati menikah dengan seorang gadis yang tidak dapat berbicara.
  
Ini adalah era Taisho. Kyogoku Kazunari, yang dapat mendengar suara hati orang, memanfaatkan kemampuannya dengan terampil dengan menjalankan perusahaan perdagangan.
Bisnisnya berjalan dengan baik, tetapi karena kekuatannya, dia tidak dapat mempercayai orang lain dan telah cukup pahit sejauh ini.
Ingin memanfaatkan koneksi mereka, Kazunari telah melamar putri dari keluarga bangsawan Suwabe. Namun, tidak hanya dia tidak dapat mendengar suara batin pasangannya Suwabe Nana, dia juga tidak dapat berbicara.
Sementara Kazunari bingung, mereka berdua menikah mendadak…? Kehidupan pernikahan yang canggung tapi bahagia dimulai untuk mereka.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Kiraware Kizoku ni Koi wo suru

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は嫌われ貴族に恋をする

altTitles.en: The Villainess Falls for the Notorious Noble

altTitles.ru: Злодейка влюбляется в печально известного дворянин

altTitles.id: Putri Jahat Jatuh Cinta Pada Bangsawan yang Dibenci

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金和被討厭的貴族陷入愛河

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật phản diện tái sinh vào thế giới quý tộc khét tiếng

description.en:
Aikawa Eri dies in a traffic accident after staying up all night playing an otome game. She reincarnates as Eris, the villainess of her favorite game. In order to avoid the bad end, she tries her best to change the story, but as expected, it’s hard to rewrite fate…

She is abandoned by the prince. Even more, her life almost ends when she is attacked by a gang of thugs, but a young man appears…

Will the antisocial prince change her destiny? This is the reincarnated villainess’s rebirth romance fantasy!
description.ja:
破滅の運命を変えるのは、日陰者? 転生悪役令嬢の復活恋愛ファンタジー!

乙女ゲームの徹夜プレイ明けに交通事故に遭い、異世界に、しかもゲーム内の悪役令嬢エリスとして転生してしまった愛川絵里。
BAD ENDを回避すべく「誰からも好かれる」エリスになろうと奔走した彼女だったが、やはり運命を変えることはできず……。
王子に捨てられ、さらに暴漢に襲われ人生が終わろうとしたとき、一人の青年が現れ――。

破滅へ向かう運命を変えるのは、日陰者の王子様? 転生悪役令嬢の復活恋愛ファンタジー!
description.ru: Айкава Эри умерла, попав в дорожно-транспортное происшествия после того, как не спала всю ночь, играя в отомэ-игру. После аварии она переродилась в теле главной злодейки своей любимой игры, которую зовут Эрида. Чтобы избежать плохой концовки, девушка изо всех сил старается изменить историю, но как оказалось, переписывать судьбу очень сложно. Всё пошло не так, как она хотела. И когда она оказалась на волоске от смерти, Эриду спас прекрасный молодой человек. Что же её ждёт дальше? Это история о перерождении в главную злодейку отомэ-игры!
description.vi:
Aikawa Eri chết trong một vụ tai nạn giao thông sau khi thức cả đêm để chơi game otome. Cô tái sinh thành Eris, nhân vật phản diện trong trò chơi yêu thích của cô. Để tránh dẫn đến kết cục tồi tệ, cô ấy đã cố gắng hết sức để thay đổi câu chuyện, nhưng đúng như dự đoán, khó mà có thể viết lại số phận…

Cô bị hoàng tử bỏ rơi. Thậm chí, cuộc sống của cô gần như kết thúc khi cô bị một nhóm côn đồ tấn công , nhưng một người đàn ông trẻ đã xuất hiện…

Liệu chàng hoàng tử chống đối có thay đổi được vận mệnh của cô? Đây là ảo tưởng lãng của nhân vật phản diện được tái sinh!

description.en:
A mature and reliable Leader x A pure and frivolous Bubbly guy

Sui Yi claims that Ning Lan hasn't spoken a word in truth, and later discovers that even his "I don't like you" was a lie. He was crazy to consider this person as kind solely based on his pure and naive smile. His clear eyes were just like those of that person's...

altTitles.ja: テセウスの船

description.en:
28 years ago, Tamura's parent was responsible for a mass indescriminate poisoning case while he was in elementary school, and he grew up branded the son of a criminal. After his wife dies in childbirth, Tamura heads back to Hokaido to confront his past. The mysteries surrounding his father, a police officer, goes back to the year of 1989…

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Ship of Theseus** (2019)

altTitles.ja: ヴィンランド・サガ

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

title.en: No Way I'll Go into the Cornfield With You!

description.en:
Jiang Lieyang, a spoiled rich kid  who was born in the Jiangnan region, was deceived by his own mother and sent to the Dongbei countryside. Where the mysterious local resident Xun Zao became Jiang Lieyang’s “acting guardian”

Not being used to the living habits and the difference in local customs make the pampered Jiang Lieyang want to escape, but he couldn't help but getting closer and closer to Xun Zao...

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ni Nattara Suki na Hito ni Hirowareta

altTitles.ja: 犬になったら好きな人に拾われた。

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Vida como o Cachorrinho da Inukai-san

altTitles.zh: 无意间变成狗，被喜欢的女生捡回家。

altTitles.zh-hk: 變成狗後被喜歡的人撿回家。

description.en:
A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)
description.pt-br:
Uma pequena comédia ecchi onde você está sendo cuidado por uma garota legal e bonita! 

Quando você acordou, você se viu como o cachorro de estimação de uma garota chamada Inukai-san! Na escola, Inukai-san não tem nenhuma expressão no rosto, mas ela adora cachorros! Ela ama tanto cachorros que vai transformar você em um cão, de corpo e alma! 

Uma comédia erótica que faz você querer deixar de ser humano!

altTitles.ja: 無名の剣　中国幻想選

description.en: A wandering swordsman takes on the challenge of killing the king. The story of "Mumei no Ken" shows a master of the bow, a master of the spear, a master of combat, a born villain, etc... Here the lifestyle of these extraordinary people from six classic Chinese stories is portrayed!
description.pt-br: Um espadachim errante assume o desafio de matar o rei. A história de "Mumei no Ken" mostra um mestre do arco, um mestre da lança, um mestre do combate, um vilão nato e etc... Aqui é retratado o estilo de vida dessas pessoas extraordinárias de seis histórias clássicas chinesas!

title.en: Anecdotes with Master After the Novel Transmigration

altTitles.zh: 穿书后与师尊二三事 醋精师尊

description.en: After transmigration, both Shizun and the original protagonist's personas went out of character!! Double male lead, Shizun x Transmigrator.

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

description.en:
"I was going to make a bet on whether your soul would be corrupted."
"When you become an adult."

The demon "Luce", also known as Lucifer, Satan, the King of Hell, etc., plans a bet with God over Elijah, who possesses a rare pure soul.
On the day he meets Elijah for the first time, Luce tries to give up the bet after Elijah discovers his true identity, but Elijah holds him back.

"I just have to choose between him and you, don't I?"
"Don't give up on me already."

Luce is impressed by Elijah's defiance and agrees to take him under his wing.
He visits Elijah from time to time and insists that he sign a contract with him when he comes of age.

The day Elijah finally becomes an adult, He makes an unexpected request to Luce...

altTitles.ja: ものづくり部

title.en: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool Kanojo ni Onegai Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: クール彼女にお願いしてみた

altTitles.en: I Tried asking a favor to my Cool Girlfriend

altTitles.ro: Am Încercat Să-i Cer o Favoare Iubitei Mele Cool

description.en:
Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

altTitles.ja: カッパ少年紅介〜昭和妖怪恋物語

altTitles.zh: 河童少年红介~昭和妖怪恋物语~
